name: TalkBlazing
_source: speak;Blazing;I wanted to keep an eye on his Majesty.|Why not do both?
speak;Sages;C'mon, he's fine!|Sal's with him anyway.
speak;Blazing;Well, if anyone needs to lift him, I've got muscle to spare.
speak;Sages;Look, there was something I wanted to ask.
speak;Sages;Your revealed physique is taking all the attention from me!
speak;Blazing;That ain't much of a question...|But, I can teach you my regimen, if you'd like.
speak;Sages;Too much work, I think putting on a bigger shirt is easier.
speak;Blazing;I'm sure you're plenty eye-catching enough, boss.
speak;Blazing;Now, I better keep at my training, peace.
